alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 12:30PM EST until January 13 at 2:12AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Hampshire...Maine... Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Belknap and Merrimack Counties. Presumpscot River At West Falmouth affecting Cumberland County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Suncook River at North Chichester. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Flooding occurs at multiple campgrounds in the region. Water approaches homes along Bachelder Road and properties along Riverside Drive in Allenstown. Buck Street in Epsom floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 6.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 9.7 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Friday evening. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
